etymology.description: Depicts a tongue (舌) moving, indicating speech.
etymology.interpretation: This character intuitively conveys the concept of speech through its representation of the tongue's movement as essential for verbal expression.

examples.chinese: 他说得很好(他說得很好)。
我喜欢听你讲话(我喜歡聽你講話)。
examples.english: I enjoy listening to you speak.
